recommended_degree: Sains Data, Statistika dan Sains Data, Teknik Informatika, Ilmu Komputer, Sistem Informasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
JOB DESCRIPTION: You will focus on solving our most critical data and strategy challenges. You will clean up unreliable data and drive a major product portfolio review to ensure confidence in our metrics. You will gain deep experience in data governance and strategic decision-making. You will work remotely/WFH
WAJIB DIBACA: Supaya CV kamu bisa dibaca oleh kami, setelah apply di portal maganghub, kamu wajib apply juga ke form perusahaan, di link berikut: http://bit.ly/Pahamify-TalentPool
